Name: Monstrüous
About the game: Monstrüous is a puzzle game in which you have to figure out in which order to use 8 actions to kill the monstruous creature. It usually takes about 30-45 min to complete the game. No crazy gaming skills required, it's the perfect game to play with your non-gamer friends or family !
Meta Title: Monstrüous: Dec 15, 2019, Arnaud Millot and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Monstrüous? Check out the release date (Dec 15, 2019), developer insights from Arnaud Millot, and a complete game summary.
